title: Portrait, 1940
medium: Technique: Two interconnected structures: plain weave (white) plus plain weave (black)Warp proportion: 2 white to 1 black. Weft proportion: 1 white to 1 black.
description: Jacquard woven portrait of Franklin Roosevelt (1882-1945) designed by M. Buchman at weaving school, Lyon, France.

tombstone.epitaph: Portrait, 1940.Technique: Two interconnected structures: plain weave (white) plus plain weave (black)Warp proportion: 2 white to 1 black. Weft proportion: 1 white to 1 black.. Gift of Félix Guicherd. 1961-154-1.
